data.title: An authentic central American place
data.text: We bumped into this place when we were in the area.  The restaurant had people in and out while the surrounding stores were closed in the evening.  We noticed almost all of them look like local residents.  We decided to give it a try and we were not disappointed. The food was authentic, as well as the Latino music and TV broadcasting in the dining area.  At some points of time, I did not know whether I should focus on my food, the music, the TV, or the beautiful servers.

data.title: Good food GREAT service
data.text: The food was good. The service was very friendly. They were great about keeping drinks filled and anticipating our needs.
